action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

We are wanting to create a new banner on the website to highlight our ServiceNow connector. The following is an example https://uplandsoftware.com/cimpl/ (half way down the page).
Location wise I think the banner should go on Home Page before testimonials, Mobile and TEM pages, before the logo carousal.
Copy in addition to logo would be:

ServiceNow Integration
Bluewater's ServiceNow Connector allows you to:
  • Send orders to MSPs, updating device and service in Bluewater, synchronising back to the ServiceNow order.
  • Synchronise User, Cost Centre and Location data between ServiceNow & Bluewater
  • Synchronise Asset (device & service) data between ServiceNow & telco billing in Bluewater
Leverage the power of Bluewater within your ServiceNow ecosystem. Fast, flexible, Powerful. Explore our Connector in ServiceNow store now!

The ServiceNow link could go to the features page in technical section.

Let me know what you think.

Thanks, Dave


 Dave Burkett
CEO | Bluewater Control Pty Ltd.
0419 989 655
david.burkett@bluewatercontrol.com
To check for meeting availability https://calendly.com/david-burkett-bluewater


WeWork Level 1, 1 Sussex Street, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 Australia
